```diff
+       ellipse 150% 100% at 50% 0%,
+       color-mix(in srgb, var(--hero-gradient-primary) calc(var(--hero-gradient-intensity) * 0.8%), transparent),
+       color-mix(in srgb, var(--hero-gradient-secondary) calc(var(--hero-gradient-intensity) * 0.6%), transparent) 50%,
+       transparent 80%
+     );
+   }
+ 
+   .hero-floating-orb-1 {
+     width: 200px;
+     height: 200px;
+     top: -10%;
+     right: -5%;
+   }
+ 
+   .hero-floating-orb-2 {
+     width: 250px;
+     height: 250px;
+     bottom: -15%;
+     left: -10%;
+   }
+ 
+   .hero-floating-orb-3 {
+     width: 150px;
+     height: 150px;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ /* Dark mode adjustments */
+ @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
+   .hero-live-gradient {
+     /* Increase intensity in dark mode for better visibility */
+     background: radial-gradient(
+       ellipse 120% 80% at 50% 0%,
+       color-mix(in srgb, var(--hero-gradient-primary) calc(var(--hero-gradient-intensity) * 1.2%), transparent),
+       color-mix(in srgb, var(--hero-gradient-secondary) calc(var(--hero-gradient-intensity) * 1%), transparent) 45%,
+       color-mix(in srgb, var(--hero-gradient-accent) calc(var(--hero-gradient-intensity) * 0.8%), transparent) 70%,
+       transparent 90%
+     );
+   }
+ 
+   .hero-floating-orb {
+     filter: blur(40px); /* Less blur in dark mode for more definition */
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ /* High contrast mode support */
+ @media (prefers-contrast: high) {
+   .hero-live-gradient {
+     --hero-gradient-intensity: 80; /* Increase intensity */
+     opacity: 1; /* Full opacity */
+     filter: none; /* Remove saturation filter */
+   }
+ 
+   .hero-floating-orb {
+     display: none; /* Hide decorative elements */
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ /* Reduced motion support */
+ @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
+   .hero-live-gradient,
+   .hero-live-gradient::before,
+   .hero-live-gradient::after {
+     animation: none;
+     transition: background 0.3s ease;
+   }
+ 
+   .hero-floating-orb {
+     animation: none;
+   }
+ 
+   .hero-text-shimmer {
+     animation: none;
+     background-position: 0 0;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ /* Performance optimization for low-end devices */
+ @media (max-resolution: 1dppx) {
+   .hero-floating-orb {
+     display: none; /* Hide complex animations on low-res displays */
+   }
+ 
+   .hero-live-gradient::before,
+   .hero-live-gradient::after {
+     display: none; /* Simplify gradient on low-res displays */
+   }
+ }
  
```

---

Perfect! Now I have successfully integrated all the CSS from the individual files into the globals.css file. Now I need to delete the individual CSS files that have been integrated. Let me start by deleting them:

---

Deleting hero-gradient.css as its content has been fully integrated into globals.css
